The President is right. Russia‚Äôs attack on Ukraine is an invasion. 

We must take down Putin‚Äôs banks and punish his henchman while speeding support to Ukraine together with our NATO allies.

Today would have been Congressman John Lewis‚Äô 82nd birthday. What an honor it was to know him and serve with him. He will forever be an American hero. Let‚Äôs honor him by continuing to make #goodtrouble. https://t.co/E1WHnsYPLn
Today, as we observe #PresidentsDay, let us honor the great presidents who have served this nation and dedicated themselves to moving us forward. https://t.co/uCxjhMRxZ2

Congresswoman Shirley Chisholm, the first African-American woman elected to Congress. Chisholm was a founding member of @TheBlackCaucus, and the first African-American woman to seek the nomination for president of the US. https://t.co/VvJPu4OKnP

Honored to join @VP as part of the US delegation to the Munich Security Conference. Our strong presence here demonstrates America‚Äôs ironclad commitment to the transatlantic partnership. Critical discussions ahead as we work with allies to advance the causes of peace & democracy. https://t.co/5VfSwLALj2

Earlier this week, I had the chance to visit the IBM factory in Poughkeepsie and to see first-hand how the #COMPETESAct will create jobs and revitalize manufacturing right here in the Hudson Valley. It‚Äôs time that we build things here in America again! https://t.co/aBwhronPhr

Leaders like Dr. A.J. Williams-Myers, Professor Emeritus of Black Studies at SUNY at New Paltz, who was widely recognized in the Hudson Valley for educating generations through African American history lessons. https://t.co/sDzReEQTRI

It's always a privilege to meet with our heroic first responders.

Thank you, @IAFFLocal2393, for stopping by today. I know I speak for the Hudson Valley when I say thank you for everything you, your team, and all first responders do to keep us safe! https://t.co/MGzoSSvX57

We are fighting to bring jobs and investment to the Hudson Valley and communities all across the country!
 
Today, I toured IBM's factory in Poughkeepsie to see first-hand how the #COMPETESAct will spur manufacturing, create jobs & help our economy thrive. https://t.co/Lvbjrh4XDJ
People like Constance Baker Motley, a legal trailblazer that led with compassion and fought to end systemic racism through our justice system. https://t.co/3d4wYt0TTe

This #BlackHistoryMonth, I'm celebrating Black trailblazers that have shaped our communities, making incredible impacts through their work and inspiring us to keep working for a more just and equitable world.

There‚Äôs no better way to spend Valentine‚Äôs Day than bringing joy to our local veterans.

Today, I had the privilege of delivering more than 10,000 valentines made by schools, families, and small businesses across the Hudson Valley to our local VA hospital. Happy #ValentinesDay! https://t.co/vWRBBM8rLg

Driving at night with someone who says: ‚ÄúTurn off the headlights!‚Äù You say: ‚ÄúThat would be dangerous and dumb.‚Äù Next morning person says: ‚ÄúSee, you‚Äôve turned off the headlights. I was right all along!‚Äù Sound familiar?

Thanks to the Infrastructure Law, NY will get $25 million to build EV charging stations & create good-paying jobs in the process. This funding is essential for the Hudson Valley, where our district only has one charging station for every 50 EVs on the road. #ElectrifyingAmerica https://t.co/dqtii5k0p1

It‚Äôs clear: Democrats' policies have helped get us through this pandemic & life is getting back to normal as a result.

As I told @ErinBurnett, the time is always right to do what's right and now is the time to move on from mandates. Check out this clip from our conversation ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/ReyivqBBRM

Times have changed. Cases are falling rapidly. Vaccines are widely available w/ 75% of all NYers vaxed. If vaccinated/boosted ur 97x less likely to die. Good masks protect you, even if others are unmasked. In NY, it can be an individual decision. https://t.co/ShEY3faOVU

Around the world, many LGBTQI+ people face a constant threat of violence and persecution. That's why I voted to pass the #GlobalRespectAct today. The United States must lead the charge and impose real penalties on anyone who violates the human rights of the LGBTQI+ community.

Thank you to President Biden and Governor Hochul for getting us to this point. We are making tremendous progress thanks to their strong, science-based leadership. 

I fully support the decision to roll back mask mandates.

Democrats' plan to fight COVID is working - cases are down & vaccines are widely available. Now, it's time to give people their lives back. 

With science as our guide, we're ready to start getting back to normal. 

https://t.co/ws1VCIIEy2

This conduct is unacceptable.

This goes beyond policy or party - just treat people with common courtesy and respect. @RepHalRogers, you owe Congresswoman Beatty an apology. https://t.co/4szNoJFh5A

On #SaferInternetDay, I'm joining @RepSusanWild and my colleagues in calling on social media platforms to take down dangerous videos that are worsening the crisis of youth suicides. We need to ensure a safer internet for our children. #TakeThemDown

Join me live now as House Democratic Leadership highlights how we‚Äôre delivering for the American people! 

#DemocratsDeliver https://t.co/yKdxyZSeGG

I stand with my @LGBTEqCaucus colleagues in our committed fight to end the HIV/AIDS epidemic. Get tested & know your status. #NBHAAD https://t.co/swCBYVYFc6

Simply put, the Infrastructure Law = Jobs

Unions are the bedrock of our economy and a critical resource for workers. Congressional staff work day in and day out to serve our nation and I fully support their right to unionize and advocate for themselves.

The Biden boom is real! In just one year, our economy has exceeded all expectations‚Äîadding 6.6 million jobs and another half a million just last month.

Thanks to the American Rescue Plan, our economy isn't just recovering from the pandemic, it is growing & thriving! https://t.co/DFPzaSP16j

The #AmericaCOMPETESAct will repair our supply chains, bring manufacturing jobs back to America, and boost our ability to compete in the global economy. This critical legislation will jumpstart our economy and ensure it continues to thrive for future generations! https://t.co/ZrxZP6ceHj

This #GunViolenceSurvivorsWeek, we must recommit to combat gun violence‚Äîensuring safer communities for generations to come. House Dems passed H.R. 8 because we know background checks work and commonsense gun laws save lives. Senate Republicans must take action to pass H.R. 8. https://t.co/kQOj0JHBFt

Today, U.S. Armed Forces successfully conducted a counterterrorism mission, killing ISIS leader Abu Ibrahim al-Hashimi al-Qurashi. This operation will result in a safer world for us all. Thank you to our brave troops and President Biden for his decisive leadership.
As we celebrate the resiliency and beauty of Black America, let us be true allies‚Äîstanding in solidarity in to ensure their fight for equity is never a lonely one.

Celebrating #BlackHistoryMonth is how we honor and share the stories of Black Americans who have shaped our nation and continue to move our country forward.

Black history is yesterday, today, and tomorrow. https://t.co/e9NM9Y3iBW

I was thrilled to host local leaders in Newburgh today to highlight what the infrastructure package means for the Hudson Valley.
¬†
For New York, in 2022 alone, it means $150 million to remove lead pipes and $400 million for clean water investments.
¬†
Help is here. (2/2)

Across America 10 million households lack safe drinking water.
¬†
Thanks to the Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act, $55 billion is on the way to ensure our communities have clean water by removing lead pipes, addressing contaminants, and cleaning up polluted sites.
¬†
(1/2) https://t.co/T53K4n9GIT

On this day in 1964, the 24th amendment was ratified‚Äîeliminating poll taxes at the ballot box‚Äîa Jim Crow tactic disenfranchising Black voters. Yet, almost 60 years later, we are still fighting for free and fair elections. It's past time we rectify the legacy of systemic racism. https://t.co/Nw0xvyS5f4

Today marks 49 years since the #RoevWade decision protected a woman‚Äôs right to reproductive freedom.

Republicans want to bring back an era of draconian bans & government control over women‚Äôs bodies. I voted for the Women‚Äôs Health Care Protection Act to ensure we never go back. https://t.co/HHi4p8TRvT

Please honor and pray for the family of NYPD Officer Jason Rivera, who at 22 lost his life last night serving his community, and for the full recovery of fellow Officer Wilbert Mora, just 27. Truly the Finest. https://t.co/T6eIVZ1ch4

After serving our country, veterans should not have to navigate a bureaucratic system just to access health care. Proud to vote for the Ensuring Veterans‚Äô Smooth Transition (EVEST) Act today, which eliminates barriers to health care coverage for our veterans.

Let us hold Congregation Beth Israel and the entire Jewish community in our hearts as we pray for a peaceful resolution and the safety of the hostages. 

It is shameful how common anti-Semitic violence has become in our country. We cannot allow this to be normalized.

Every elected official must speak out today and be clear: 
 
‚û° Jan 6th was an unacceptable, violent attempt to overturn an election
‚û° The 2020 election was a free and fair election, and the results are valid

https://t.co/FrKbqdWBCi

Expansions like this are possible because of funding from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act we passed this fall and I am proud that these funds will be coming home to New York! #StateOfTheStateNY¬†(3/3)
Since day one, improving our infrastructure in the Hudson Valley has been my top priority and I have been advocating for this much-needed project in particular. #StateOfTheStateNY¬†(2/3)

During today's #StateOfTheStateNY address, @GovKathyHochul announced that the state would be accelerating the much-needed expansion of Route 17. I want to thank Gov. Hochul for her commitment to improving our critical infrastructure across New York. (1/3)

Heading into the New Year, I can't help but reflect on 2021. From passing a landmark infrastructure law to helping 2000+ constituents, I'm proud of what we've delivered for the Hudson Valley & wanted to share some highlights.
¬†
Excited for the work ahead in 2022. #HappyNewYear https://t.co/7HNMB6bMSD

The #BuildBackBetter Act is the biggest investment in families in American history! (4/5)

¬†

There is currently no federal standard for using terms like ‚Äònatural‚Äô when labeling personal care products. That means companies can put anything on your products despite what‚Äôs inside.
¬†
My bill the #NaturalCosmeticsAct will change that by requiring transparent FDA standards. https://t.co/FarZXuHTSv

Today, I joined local leaders to celebrate the enormous investments coming to our communities in the Hudson Valley.¬†

Proud to have worked on the historic Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act which will create millions of jobs & invest to fix our crumbling roads & bridges. https://t.co/ZiZtYy81iR

Last night we passed the largest federal investment EVER in public transit, bridges, water infrastructure & more.

Simply put, the Bipartisan Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act is an historic investment in America‚Äôs future.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act invests directly in the Hudson Valley & NY:
$11b in funding for the MTA
